alert.note: Alert for Putnam; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 5:55PM EDT until July 04 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... Northeastern Putnam County in northeastern Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 555 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Federal Point, or 8 miles north of Hastings, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hastings, Federal Point, Spuds and Elkton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
